trans-unit.source: Represents a language tag for use in XAML markup.
trans-unit.target: XAML 태그에서 사용 하기 위해 언어 태그를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The language tag may or may not have a registered <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> present on the system where the XAML is interpreted.
trans-unit.target: 언어 태그 있거나 등록 된 없을 <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>XAML 해석 되 고 시스템에 있는.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: This class is useful for dealing with values represented using `xml:lang` in XML.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 사용 하 여 표시 되는 값을 다루기 위해 유용 `xml:lang` xml에서입니다.

trans-unit.source: Language tags can be specified in two-character form or in a hyphenated language-locale form.
trans-unit.target: 두 문자 형식 또는 하이픈을 넣은 언어 로캘 형식 언어 태그를 지정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: See [RFC 3066](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=132454).
trans-unit.target: 참조 [RFC 3066](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=132454)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Note that the XML specification allows the empty string for `xml:lang`, although that is not permitted by RFC 3066; therefore, the XmlLanguage type permits "" (empty attribute string).
trans-unit.target: XML 사양에 대 한 빈 문자열을 허용 하는지 확인 `xml:lang`하지만, RFC 3066에서 허용 되지 않는; XmlLanguage 유형은 허용 합니다. 따라서 "" (빈 문자열 특성).

trans-unit.source: A default-constructed XmlLanguage behaves as if constructed with "" (empty string).
trans-unit.target: 기본 생성 된 XmlLanguage 동작으로 생성 되는 경우 "" (빈 문자열)입니다.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML Values *prefix* Language prefix, using the ISO 639-1 language prefix values.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 특성 사용 ``` - or - ``` # # XAML 값 *접두사* ISO 639-1 언어 접두사 값을 사용 하는 언어 접두사입니다.

trans-unit.source: For example "en", or "zh".
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 "en" 또는 "글꼴"입니다.

trans-unit.source: Uppercase values are accepted and converted to lowercase.
trans-unit.target: 대문자로 값이 허용 하 고 소문자로 변환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This may also be an empty attribute, "".
trans-unit.target: 빈 특성 될 수 있습니다 ""입니다.

trans-unit.source: *subcode* If provided, must be preceded by a single hyphen.
trans-unit.target: *하위 코드* 제공 된 경우와 단일 하이픈으로 야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Then, a subcode as defined by RFC 3066.
trans-unit.target: 그런 다음 한 하위 코드 RFC 3066에 정의 된 대로입니다.

trans-unit.source: The most typical usage, and the one which is most likely to properly map to a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>, is a country or regional designation such as "-us" or "-hk".
trans-unit.target: 가장 일반적 사용과는 가능성이 가장 높은 적절 하 게 매핑되는 <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>와 같은 국가 / 지역별 지정은 "-us" 또는 "-hk".</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Uppercase values are accepted and converted to lowercase.
trans-unit.target: 대문자로 값이 허용 하 고 소문자로 변환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a static <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref> instance as would be created by <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage*> with the language tag as an empty attribute string.
trans-unit.target: 정적 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref> 만드는 인스턴스 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage*>빈 특성 문자열로 언어 태그로.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage*>

trans-unit.source: This value is in effect the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage> corresponding to <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, whose <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetEquivalentCulture%2A> result is <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 이 값은 실제로 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>를 해당 <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetEquivalentCulture%2A>결과 <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetEquivalentCulture%2A> </xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>

trans-unit.source: The empty language tag version of <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref>, for use in comparison operations.
trans-unit.target: 빈 태그의 기본 언어가 <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref>, 비교 작업에 사용 하도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the appropriate equivalent <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref>, if and only if such a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> is registered for the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag*> value of this <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref>
trans-unit.target: 적절 한에 해당 하는 반환 <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>이 <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref>경우, 이러한 경우에는 <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>에 대 한 등록은 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag*>값이 <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag*> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: If no equivalent <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> can be produced, this method raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: 하는 경우 해당 키 없음 <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>수 생성 된,이 메서드가 예외를 발생 시킵니다.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: If you do not wish to handle exceptions, call <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetSpecificCulture%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: 예외를 처리 하지 않을 경우 호출할 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetSpecificCulture%2A>대신.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetSpecificCulture%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that can be used for localization-globalization API calls that take that type as an argument.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>해당 형식을 인수로 사용 하는 지역화 세계화 API 호출을 사용할 수 있는.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: No registered <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> for the provided <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref> exists, as determined by a call to <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultureInfoByIetfLanguageTag*>.
trans-unit.target: 등록 된 아니요 <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>제공 <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref> <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultureInfoByIetfLanguageTag*>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultureInfoByIetfLanguageTag*> 를 호출 하 여 결과</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref> instance, based on a string representing the language per RFC 3066.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref> RFC 3066 당 언어를 나타내는 문자열에 따라 인터페이스입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is effectively the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 사실상 생성자입니다.

trans-unit.source: The language string may be empty, or else must conform to [RFC 3066](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=132454) rules: - The first subtag must consist of only [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ascii](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ascii-md.md)] letters.
trans-unit.target: 언어 문자열은 비어 있을 수 있습니다. 그렇지 않으면 따라야 [RFC 3066](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=132454) 규칙:-첫 번째 하위 태그만 구성 되어야 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ascii](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ascii-md.md)] 문자입니다.

trans-unit.source: - Additional subtags must consist [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ascii](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ascii-md.md)] letters or numerals.
trans-unit.target: -추가 하위 태그 이루어져야 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ascii](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ascii-md.md)] 문자 또는 숫자입니다.

trans-unit.source: - Subtags are separated by a single hyphen character.
trans-unit.target: -하위 태그 단일 하이픈 문자로 구분 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: - Every subtag must be 1 to 8 characters long.
trans-unit.target: -모든 하위 태그 1 ~ 8 자 여야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - No leading or trailing hyphens are permitted.
trans-unit.target: -선행 또는 후행 하이픈 허용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: An RFC 3066 language string, or empty string.
trans-unit.target: RFC 3066 언어 문자열 또는 빈 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref> with the provided string as its <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag*> value.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref> 으로 제공 된 문자열이와 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag*>값.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag*>

trans-unit.source: ietfLanguageTag parameter cannot be null.
trans-unit.target: ietfLanguageTag매개 변수는 null 일 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: ietfLanguageTag parameter was non-empty, but did not conform to the syntax specified in RFC 3066.
trans-unit.target: ietfLanguageTag매개 변수는 비어 있지 않은, 했지만 RFC 3066에 지정 된 구문에 부합 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: 설명 부분을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: Returns the most-closely-related non-neutral <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 가장 밀접 하 게 관련 비 중립 <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>이 <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: If this <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage> is equal to <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.Empty%2A?displayProperty=fullName> then this method will return <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage> <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.Empty%2A?displayProperty=fullName>이 메서드는 <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 를 반환 하는 다음</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.Empty%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 같으면</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage> 이

trans-unit.source: This method finds the registered <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> matching the longest-possible prefix of this <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>이 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage> 가능한 가장 긴 접두사 일치 하는</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> 등록 된 찾을

trans-unit.source: If that registered <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> is neutral (<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.IsNeutralCulture%2A> is `true`), then this method relies on a call to <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CreateSpecificCulture%2A> to map from a neutral <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to a specific one.
trans-unit.target: 등록 된 <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>중립적 (<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.IsNeutralCulture%2A> 은 `true`),이 방법은에 대 한 호출에 의존 하는 다음 <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CreateSpecificCulture%2A>중립에서 매핑할 <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>특정 책갈피로.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CreateSpecificCulture%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.IsNeutralCulture%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that can be used for localization-globalization [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-api-md.md)] calls that take that type as an argument.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>지역화 전역화를 위해 사용할 수 있는 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-api-md.md)] 해당 형식을 인수로 사용 하는 호출.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: No related non-neutral <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> is registered for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref> <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag*>.
trans-unit.target: 없음 관련된 비 중립 <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>현재 등록 되어 <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref> <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag*>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag*> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Gets the string representation of the language tag.
trans-unit.target: 언어 태그의 문자열 표현을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This property may return a normalized version of the originally-specified string as provided to <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage%2A> 에 제공 된 원래 지정 된 문자열의 정규화 된 버전을 반환할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This property may also return <xref:System.String.Empty> if an empty string was provided to <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 <xref:System.String.Empty>빈 문자열 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.GetLanguage%2A> 에 제공 하는 경우</xref:System.String.Empty> 반환할 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the language tag.
trans-unit.target: 언어 태그의 문자열 표현입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref:System.String>을 나타내는 <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This returns the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag%2A> value of the current <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage> Current의 값</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage.IetfLanguageTag%2A> 을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>을 나타내는 <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>
